long_prompt: A large, elegant feather umbrella, with delicate, wispy feathers in shades of white and gray, delicately held aloft by a graceful woman walking along a serene lakeside promenade at sunset, the sky painted in hues of pink and orange.

A large, elegant feather umbrella stands gracefully in the hands of a well-dressed woman, gently shielding her from the rain as she walks along a quaint, cobblestone street lined with charming cafes and boutiques.

A large, elegant feather umbrella with intricate, shimmering patterns unfurled gracefully over a group of elegantly dressed women at a lavish outdoor tea party, its soft, downy feathers ruffling gently in the warm breeze.
